channel.title: If you have trouble portforwarding. (Click here)
channel.description:
Hello, In the past I have had trouble with portforwarding I kept asking around on here as well as on "Portforward.Com."
However, I found that no one seems to want to help with this problem, So I decided to contact my Router's provider for example my router is a "Intellinet, Active networking" Just type in your companys name, and then select "Support."
Well, Hope I helped someone :).
~Sincerly~ Microsoft1.
